website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for those wanting a classic firestone sink with an included protective strainer.
pros: Includes a metal grid strainer for extra sink protection and straightforward food cleanup
Remarkably resistant to chips, stains, and scratches
A great choice if you want an inexpensive yet durable sink
cons: A few buyers had the metal strainer missing when item was shipped

customer_reviews.title: So nice I'll buy it twice!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth every penny. This is a gorgeous farmhouse sink and drains wonderfully. Perfect size, too. Any bigger would be wayyyy too big. We also wash our 6 month old in it!! Very happy. We are moving and will be buying it for our new place too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Proxy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Farmhouse Sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is so pretty! I love how it turned out in our kitchen. The sink came in a large box, it was about 200 lbs. My father in law installed the sink. He had to place support beams on each side of the sink and from the bottom of the cabinet to the top of the sink, because it is so large and heavy. I will give an updated review in a few months after I use it more often.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sink. Doesn't slope much inside so a little hard to get the food into the drain.....
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a 30 inch farmhouse sink and found it on Amazon at a very good price. The finish is smooth and the included grid prevents the bottom of pans from marking the sink. The sink is not as deep as I though it’d be, but still a beautiful addition to our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Padmini Raman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the sink. It came very Well packaged. No damage. We installed it and it works great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Annelise

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: We used this sink for our IKEA/Semihandmade kitchen and it looks great. Picture is during installation.
customer_reviews.author: gym fan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs some type of pitch on it to drain better. Otherwise my wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement sink purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This sink was purchased as an exact replacement for a sink we installed 3 years ago. The original sink was broken when a metal stein was accidentally dropped on the edge. These sinks have disappeared from the marketplace, and we were fortunate to find the replacement through Amazon. Good news was the replacement was several hundred $$ cheaper than the original 3 years ago. Shipping was very quick, and the packaging was outstanding. Since it was an exact replacement, installation was (relatively) easy. It is heavy, so you need a strong plumber. The pictures show the broken sink just to let you see what can happen if you get too clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: Warren White

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sink/Unfortunately Had to Return It
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and substantial sink. Unfortunately, I had to return it because my contractor advised it was too deep (10in vs 8in) for my custom made apron farmhouse sink cabinet. But I highly recommend it to anyone that can accommodate a 10 inch deep farmhouse sink.
customer_reviews.author: LVanzie

customer_reviews.title: Replace the grid
customer_reviews.text: the sink is great. it's easy to clean. we haven't noticed any stains or discoloration, even after leaving dishes in. my only complaint is the grid. it's not tight enough. it would work better if the wires only went one way, or if they were smaller squares. it also gets super gross, super quick. the rubber feet open up to the top, so water just sits in them and get moldy. food gets stuck where the wires cross. it's really hard to clean. so the sink is great.... the grid is not great. we're shopping for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse McKee

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are not exact
customer_reviews.text: The width of the sink I received was 30.25". It would not fit in my 30" cabinet. My cabinets are frameless and wouldn't be worth the trouble modifying the 30" cabinet. A 30" sink should be no more than 30". Adding trim or caulk to cover gaps is easy, but increasing cabinet gaps on frameless cabinets is not easy or aesthetically pleasing. My review is exclusively related the lack of precision in the specs provided. Hopefully somebody finds this helpful because I didn't see one review, question or comment mention the width being over. Even the Home Depot site lists this at a 30.25" sink (probably due to several people having the same issue).
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan McGeoghan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is beautiful! Nice and big! I love the rack on the bottom to keep pots/pans from scraping. We aren’t complete yet on the bottom cabinets but you can see how beautiful this is. It came packaged perfectly too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy frenette

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I think it cost to much but otherwise I love it. I've been using it for a little over a week now with the wire rack in place. I have to remove the rack a couple of times a week to clean under it but it only takes a few seconds and the sink looks great again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mills

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink!! So classic
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink!!! Perfect size not too huge. I like the depth because you really can’t see the dishes if they are in the sink, so the kitchen always looks tidy. Super easy to clean. I think good Price, no need to spend 700 bucks for a sink this is great. Follow me on Instagram @Inspo.by.jo for more pics!
customer_reviews.author: Inspo.By.Jo

customer_reviews.title: defect product and havent heard back from seller
customer_reviews.text: Would appreciate hearing from seller. We bought this for a house build. It was installed and the cleaning people were cleaning when the cleaning rag snagged something and the enamel pulled off. I now have have the entire countertop removed and sink replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a farm sink for so long. I finally have one AND this sink could not be more perfect. It was shipped carefully and arrived intact. Our contractor had no issues installing it. We’ve received so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this sink for about 6 months installed in my newly remodeled kitchen. It was easy install and looks beautiful. This sink does not stain it’s very durable looks flawless and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: KP2000

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean & Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: We are still in the process of remodeling our kitchen but my husband installed this 2 months ago. It has held up really well, cleans beautifully, and is going to look beautiful once our cabinets are finished. So glad I cancelled the one I had ordered prior (based on poor reviews) and got this one!! It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy O.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but Sapphire Blue color way off!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Sapphire Blue sink. It arrived in great shape. It was solid and seemed to be very well made. The problem was that the color was WAY off. The sink only appeared to be blue when it was in very dim lighting. As soon as you placed any light on it, the sink appeared to be purple instead. In direct sun light, it appeared to be 100% purple. Considering my plan was to mount the sink directly under an exterior window, I had to return it. I had no need for a purple sink.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Great sink for the money, and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink! We had to fit the sink to our older cabinets, but it worked great. Once building a frame underneath to make it fit and hold properly, it really takes our kitchen to the next level of modern farmhouse. When we finish up our kitchen, it will look flawless. I especially love the stainless grid it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this sink installed for about a week, but so far I absolutely LOVE it! It looks beautiful in my kitchen! Will update review after I've had it a little longer as some people said it stains, etc.
customer_reviews.author: BookLvr4

customer_reviews.title: Love the sink
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink. Make sure you put the grate in before you use it. Had scratches in a couple days. Overall would buy the sink again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff House

customer_reviews.title: Rugged but elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is not just functional, but also stunning. The grate is just what is needed in this sink. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Scot C.

customer_reviews.title: Bottom grid missing rubber piece
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink. Only thing was the bottom grid was missing a rubber piece causing it to be wobbly. Not sure how to find another that would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: IM IN LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase!!! It’s my favorite part of my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: taylor miller

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful choice
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink! Can't believe what great quality for the money. It arrived without damage and was not to hard to install. The grate is perfect and is such a great feature to have included.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was very hesitant to buy a sink online but I did And I couldn’t be more happy. I love it and the price is amazing
customer_reviews.author: benjamin sarshar

customer_reviews.title: This sink is a work of art.
customer_reviews.text: Looking at the details of any cast sink will tell you the quality and this one is like a high-quality china cup but sturdy as a tank.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink! Came in great packaging, although it was extremely heavy. It’s now installed and is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Cazaubon

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sink, incredible price!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is absolutely perfect! It is everything we wanted in an apron fireclay sink! Major plus that it came with the wire rack. My husband said that because the drain is a bit lower, install was more than he anticipated but still not complicated for a handyman who isn't a plumber. :) I would buy this over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Best sink!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink. Installed in my remodeled 1932 farmhouse. Easy to clean. It’s the conversation piece in the kitchen for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Quality made sink
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink it’s a quality made product thank you for making a good sink
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is gorgeous! It was easy to install and looks so nice with our new countertops. The included rack was a nice bonus. Get this sink!
customer_reviews.author: S_Polwort

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sink, good quality and it looks great in my new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Dafoe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love my sink. It’s very easy to clean and most of all is that it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sink. Durable, easy to clean, beautiful presentation, well worth the money. Very heavy though!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, but doesnt stay clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love having a farmhouse sink- nice and big, and looks great in the kitchen. However, this one gets stained quickly on the bottom. It does not wipe off with water, and cleaner needs to be used. It does go back to the original color after you scrub, but it has to be done every few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: The width online says 30" but it measured 30.5" when I got it. The sink was .5" too big for the cabinet so I had to return it. This does not fit an ikea 30" sektion base cabinet as it is made for exactly 30".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sink!
customer_reviews.text: big, beautiful and white! So far 3 months later, no stains, no chips. And I LOVE the rack that comes with it! otherwise I probably would have many broken dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris s

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink. Can't wait to get it installed in my new custom home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product not straight
customer_reviews.text: Just had our kitchen ready to install opened box and the sink was not straight Had to buy it ahead of time for measurements and now our return window is close.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Benson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, elegant, classic apron sink. Great customer service too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Bocci apron front sink
customer_reviews.text: The sink arrived quickly and is beautiful and perfect! We are thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Mamie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Was packed well but did have a little scratch. No big deal. Just faced that to the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just Received it and it looks great! We will install it in a few weeks when our granite tops are ready.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, looks great. Great price! We love our farmhouse sink.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Color in photo is not color of sink.
customer_reviews.text: Not even CLOSE to the color in the picture. Had to box this heavy sink back up and lug it to UPS to return. Very disappointed. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Marc Grimpe

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: My sink did not come with a protector for the bottom as pictured
customer_reviews.author: TL87

product_meta.title: BOCCHI 1138-001-0120 Classico Apron Front Fireclay 30 in. Single Bowl Kitchen Sink with Protective Bottom Grid and Strainer in White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteBOCCHI Farmhouse sinks bring back the ultimate material to your kitchen. Fireclay, a 100% natural organic and recyclable material used by Craftsman for centuries to create timeless appliances has now returned to your kitchen. With the firing in our Kilns up to 2000°f temperatures, fireclay becomes the most durable material used in today's kitchens. Thus, dealing with extreme heat coming from pots and pans is definitely not a problem. Due to their special glaze coating fused with the fireclay body, our sinks have a non-porous, uniform, scratch and stain resistant surface. With its protective bottom grid and distinctive looks, BOCCHI Farmhouse sinks are truly crafted to match your design and functional desires.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
BOCCHI Farmhouse sinks bring back the ultimate material to your kitchen. Fireclay, a 100% natural organic and recyclable material used by Craftsman for centuries to create timeless appliances has now returned to your kitchen. With the firing in our Kilns up to 2000°f temperatures, fireclay becomes the most durable material used in today's kitchens. Thus, dealing with extreme heat coming from pots and pans is definitely not a problem. Due to their special glaze coating fused with the fireclay body, our sinks have a non-porous, uniform, scratch and stain resistant surface. With its protective bottom grid and distinctive looks, BOCCHI Farmhouse sinks are truly crafted to match your design and functional desires.

SET CONTAINS:
single-bowl-sinks

See more
feature_bullets: Outside Sink Dimensions: 30" Length x 18" Width x 10" Height | Fits Cabinet Size: 33" | Inside Sink Dimensions: 28 1/2" Length x 16 1/2" Width x 8 1/2" Height
Includes removable protective bottom grid & strainer
100% non-porous surface provides unmatched stain resistance compared to matte stone or other composite materials
Extreme resistance to chip, discoloration, scratching and cracking
Deals with extreme heat coming from pots and pans

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars160 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
